meanings.definition: A short, vertical post used in a row to support a rail.
meanings.sent1: The staircase was safe because the balusters held up the handrail.
meanings.sent2: The balcony had beautiful balusters lining its edge.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to balance on the balusters like a tightrope walker.
meanings.sent4: The rows of balusters resembled a small army standing guard along the staircase.
meanings.sent5: The wooden balusters added a touch of elegance to the staircase.
